A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When marketers were putting together ad campaigns they decided to emphasize “Don’t Let Anyone Spoil This Movie.” This is an indication that there are going to be some unexpected things in the movie. In one of the spots Luke says “This is not going to go the way you think.” It certainly did not. While the Star Wars Universe remained true to form\, this movie expanded the Universe. The force is used in ways that we haven’t seen before. New characters are encountered and new locations explored. If you are a person who is sensitive and overly critical about making fictional movies more realistic\, save some money and your sanity. However\, if you can enjoy a movie without over-thinking it\, this is a great escape.
